document_data.name: ''Throwing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Throwing''''' was a [[weapon quality|quality]] that could be applied to any melee weapon, enabling it to be thrown.
document_data.Power: A weapon with this property could be hurled effectively at enemies up to {{SI|10|ft}} if the wielder was proficient with it normally.
document_data.Creation: To craft a ''throwing'' weapon, a spellcaster had to have ''[[magic stone]]'' available.
document_data.Examples: * ''[[Craftmaster]]'', the personal weapon of the craftsman god [[Gond]], was a ''+4 [[impact]] [[returning]] [[seeking]] throwing [[warhammer]]''.
